VISION_P1.message: AccessiTech LLC is a social enterprise dedicated to removing barriers for disabled design technologists by producing and sharing relevant industry expertise and personal / professional exploration via content across multiple social, hosting, and streaming platforms.
VISION_P1.description: About Section: first paragraph describing the vision of the company

VISION_P2.message: As a social enterprise, AccessiTech LLC fosters positive social change by promoting and collaborating on emergent technologies aimed at increasing accessibility, inclusion, and equity for all.
VISION_P2.description: About Section: second paragraph describing the vision of the company

PURPOSE_HEADER.description: Purpose Section: header for section describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P1.message: AccessiTech believes access to technology is a human right, particularly when such technology promotes, protects, and/or facilitates other human rights.
PURPOSE_P1.description: Purpose Section: first paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P2.message: Producing and publishing content on accessibility in technology, AccessiTech LLC provides clear and concise information to help disabled peoples more readily utilize the accessibility options available in their lives in order to better enable them to pursue their passions in a digital world.
PURPOSE_P2.description: Purpose Section: second paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P3.message: Through the proliferation, decentralization, and democratization of technology accessibility information, AccessiTech LLC seeks to lower the barriers to entry for disabled peoples throughout design and development communities abroad.
PURPOSE_P3.description: Purpose Section: third paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P4.message: Collaborating and promoting design and technology for social change, AccessiTech LLC aims to help create an increasingly accessible world for all.
PURPOSE_P4.description: Purpose Section: fourth paragraph describing the purpose of the company

REACH_OUT_HEADER.description: Footer Section: Header for section containing contact links in the footer
